title: Facebook was draining your iPhone, but a fix is on the way
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: Tech Talk - Today 
The Facebook app was draining iPhone batteries at an unprecedented rate. Facebook is aware of the problem, and it's rolling out fixes.<... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
